description:
Our core isn’t the only place we need a little extra warmth. The Eva skirt gives you style and protection with its full polyester shell and down feather insulation. Add in the side zips for movement and you can bring this style to the tracks or office when the temps drop.

  • Polyester shell keeps you protected, while a polyester and spandex mix at the sides stretch, allowing freedom of motion and comfort
  • A mix of down and feather insulation adds warmth on the front and back to fight off the cold
  • Lower side zips are there in case you need to do mid run squats
name: Kari Traa Eva Skirt - Women's
